marklogic.body: Losing weight and keeping it is difficult. I was just at the doctor and she told me to lose some weight. We're both about the same age Glenn, so I do understand. Stress can cause weight Gain. I'm thinking maybe that's what's responsible. Either way, I love you and pray for you. I'm sure you're doing the best you can. Stay healthy and well. Like George Washington, I think you are indispensable. Your fan- Erich
